about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Our mission and values
about.description: Ruby is dedicated to making healthcare accessible and convenient for everyone. We connect patients with qualified healthcare specialists through secure, easy-to-use video consultations.
about.missionText: To provide accessible, high-quality healthcare consultations from anywhere, at any time.
about.valuesText: We believe in patient-centered care, privacy, and using technology to improve healthcare outcomes.

manifest.title: Where Care Meets Craft
manifest.description: A brief declaration of our priorities and the principles that guide how we build Ruby.
manifest.intro: We believe the future of healthcare sits at the intersection of real impact and thoughtful product craft.
manifest.craft: We’re not just building software. We’re shaping an experience — carefully designed, deeply engineered, and built for patients first.
manifest.quality: Quality is often compromised in the name of speed or convenience. We don’t accept that. The best teams keep pushing, always asking how to make things a little better.
manifest.standard: We hold ourselves to that standard. We go one step further, explore what’s possible today, and move toward what should be possible tomorrow.
manifest.complexity: Healthcare is complex, especially in cancer care. That complexity is the work. Our responsibility is to take it on — with care, clarity, and conviction.

cta.title: See how personalized patient recovery fits into your practice.

mission.title: Mission
mission.subtitle: Make Every Cancer Recovery 100% Successful
mission.description: That’s why we’ve built Ruby together with oncology specialists and under supervision of Dr. Markus Knott from Stuttgart Cancer Center in the EU.

howWeHelp.title: How We Help Specialists Deliver Personalized Care.
howWeHelp.description: A Message from Our Founder Lukasz

left.title: Specialist get a dedicated platform to manage their patients and plan their recovery.
left.modalDescription: Ruby gives you a dedicated space to coordinate recovery for each patient. The platform organizes plans, tasks, and follow-ups so nothing slips through the cracks. It helps your team standardize best practices without sacrificing clinical judgment. Clear patient updates reduce back-and-forth and keep everyone aligned.

right.title: Patients get a personalized support plan they can follow and track over time.
right.modalDescription: Patients receive a tailored recovery plan built around their care path. The plan is easy to follow with clear steps and timelines. Reminders and check-ins keep them engaged between visits. Progress tracking helps them stay confident and informed.

step1.title: Create a recovery plan
step1.description: Define a tailored plan with milestones and check-ins.

step2.title: Share with the care team
step2.description: Align clinicians around the same recovery pathway.

step3.title: Activate patient guidance
step3.description: Deliver clear, actionable steps to patients at home.

step4.title: Monitor progress
step4.description: Track outcomes and surface risks early.

step5.title: Adjust the plan
step5.description: Refine recovery steps based on patient feedback.

step6.title: Close the loop
step6.description: Summarize results and keep the care team informed.

structuredIntake.title: Structured Intake
structuredIntake.description: Turn patient onboarding into a structured intake. Ruby gathers and organizes information upfront using natural language, so you start informed, and prepared.

plusMore.title: Plus, a lot more
plusMore.description: Turn patient onboarding into a structured intake. Ruby gathers and organizes information upfront using natural language, so you start informed, and prepared.

supportPlan.title: Support Plan
supportPlan.description: Patients generate a clear, easy-to-follow plan based on their intake data that they will have to verify with you. You stay in full control of content, adjustments, and clinical decisions at every step.

careMonitoring.title: Care Monitoring
careMonitoring.description: Recovery continues at home through a patient-facing interface designed for follow-up, progress tracking, and symptom reporting.
